page.title: 20P.C. Ward
page.content: P.C. Ward is our community policeman.He patrols the Admaston, Wrockwardine village,Shawbirch and Apley areas,where there are 6-7,000 people.He patrols on foot in the day and on a bicycle at night.He joined the police force four and a half years ago when he was 22 years old.You have to be 5' 8" tall to join and the uniform is dark blue with a shirt.He carries a whistle,a truncheon,a pair of handcuffs and a personal radio to contact the station.His number is 915.His training included lifesaving and first aid.Every Thursday he runs a youth club for teenagers in Admaston.P.C. Ward enjoys his work very much,meeting people in his area and going to lots of schools,as well as making regular visits to Downing House,a centre for mentally handicapped people.
